LEDI.Name: Arsenic
LEDI.Message: Tiny bubbles in the water....tiny bubbles.

LEDI.Name: AvaraSoccer
LEDI.Message: Can you score without picking up the ball?

LEDI.Name: Internet Explorer
LEDI.Message: Gee.  It's free.  That must make it good.

LEDI.Name: LionBall
LEDI.Message: Prepare yourself!  Lion Ball has more little surprises than a week old rotting duck!  The ball is on the podium in the center of the arena.  Once activated this level will self destruct in 10 minutes.......

LEDI.Name: LionBall - Lite
LEDI.Message: This is the new lite version.  Made for slower connections (not that a 3x3 would be playable on modems)Once activated this level will self destruct in 5 minutes.......

LEDI.Name: Qbert's Qlimb (zwei)
LEDI.Message: Take it to the top!Watch out for missiles, though: they pack a punch.2 Teams: Green and Yellow.

LEDI.Name: Qbert's Qlimb (drei)
LEDI.Message: Take it to the top!How many points can you score?3 Teams (or solo players): Red, Purple, and Blue.

LEDI.Name: Smear
LEDI.Message: Get the ball, get some points.
